attributes.action: The UK has to be on the Palestines Side in the war
attributes.additional_details: because we don't see a reason why Israel wants to take palestine
attributes.background: we want that the UK helps the palestinien people with the war and provide food and other stuff

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Withdraw support for Israel and support Palestine in Israel-Palestine conflict: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/648456

Increase aid and support for Palestinians: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/648337
